section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: “First Amendment assembly” means a demonstration, rally, parade, march, picket line, or other similar gathering conducted for the purpose of persons expressing their political, social, or religious views.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 121(a) of Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Second Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-336, July 22, 2020, 67 DCR 9148).
